channel.title: Comments on: Manual labour not for me

item.title: By: Fiona
item.dc:creator: Fiona
item.description: <p>Can we hope that it is only pleasantly warm, rather than hot until mid july please!</p>
item.content:encoded: Can we hope that it is only pleasantly warm, rather than hot until mid july please!

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Having a pool and having to do those tasks certainly does keep you fit! fingers crossed for a long hot summer.</p>
item.content:encoded: Having a pool and having to do those tasks certainly does keep you fit! fingers crossed for a long hot summer.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$FILE/biggrin.gif"</a>>Thanks for all the help - lets hope we all spend many hours out there this Summer!! </p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$FILE/biggrin.gif“>Thanks for all the help – lets hope we all spend many hours out there this Summer!!
